Instruction: In a bowl, mix together the granulated sugar, flour, baking powder, and salt. Stir in the milk, vanilla extract, and melted butter until combined.
In a saucepan, melt butter over medium heat. Stir in the sugar and continue cooking until the mixture turns light brown and bubbling.

Sift together flour, baking powder, and salt in a bowl. In a separate bowl, cream together the butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Add eggs, one at a time, mixing well after each addition. Gradually add the flour mixture, alternating with the milk, starting and ending with the flour mixture. Mix just until combined.
